name: Php90
body:
# Corso 
This automatic page generator is the easiest way to create beautiful pages for all of your projects. Author your page content here using GitHub Flavored Markdown, select a template crafted by a designer, and publish. After your page is generated, you can check out the new branch:


## Link utili


## Esercizi
### Codice fiscale

* [Esempio online](http://php90.herokuapp.com/cf.php)
* [Sorgenti cf.php](https://github.com/mdnmdn/php90/blob/master/cf.php)

### TODO App

* [Specifiche app](http://prezi.com/sypmsjupyds5/corso-php-todo-app/)
* [Sorgenti php](https://github.com/mdnmdn/php90/tree/master/todo)

## Funzioni
### Stringhe
* substr() 
* strlen()
* str_split()
* strtoupper()

### Array
* in_array()


### Flusso pagina
* header()
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
